name: Mother-Ducker
description:
Shoot as many of those pesky ducks before they get you.

Kill a gun duck and your health will increase by 5% also you will receive an additional 3 cartridges to help you keep going. 

Check it out on Opera GX:

https://gx.games/games/fuagkh/mother-ducker/tracks/8e2239ba-3840-46d8-b144-b2d99...

Enjoy
